name: Project Bellatrix
description:
Bellatrix is a 2D boss rush action game featuring combat inspired by Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice.

Your character is static and battles are done in turn. As a Bellatrix, you can:

  • Attack with the inner or outer square to destroy incoming projectiles
  • Attack with the inner square to potentially gain a damage buff
  • Choose to attack the boss for easy but light damage
  • Or skip your attack to try a risky parry and counterattack for big damage!

The game is currently in its prototype phase. It consists of a single boss fight that showcases different types of moves from the bosses in the game.
